src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Mnamo Jumatatu, Sara Danius, katibu wa kudumu wa Kamati ya Nobel ya Fasihi katika Chuo cha Uswidi, alitangaza hadharani wakati wa kipindi cha redio kwenye Sveriges Radio katika Uswidi kwamba kamati hiyo, kwa kutoweza kumfikia Bob Dylan moja kwa moja kuhusu ushindi wa Tuzo la Nobel la Fasihi 2016, iliacha juhudi zake za kujaribu kumfikia.
hyp_text: Jumatatu, Sara Danius, kaimu katibu wa Bodi ya Nobel ya Fasihi katika Chuo cha Uhispania, alitoa taarifa ya kawaida katika mchakato wa redio wa Sveriges Radio nchini Uswidi, kwamba kamati hiyo haikuwa na mwelekeo wa kufikia Bob Dylan kwa sababu ya kushinda Tuzo ya Nobel ya Fasihi ya mwaka 2016, na kwa hiyo ilishindwa kufanya majaribio yake.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Mkurupuko huo umechochea serikali ya India kuchukua hatua kama kuwatuma wawinda nguruwe katika maeneo yaliyoathiriwa sana, na kusambaza maelfu ya mapazia ya mbu na kunyunyiza dawa za kuua wadudu.
hyp_text: Kupatwa kwa ugonjwa kimepelekea serikali ya India kufanya maamuzi kama vile kupeleka wakala wa piga kwa eneo la kudhibitiwa kwa sababu ya athari, kupeleka mia za kamba za kuzuia wadudu na kuwapa dawa za kuzuia wadudu.

src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref_text: Pia alikuwa anashughulika na uchoraji wa noti za benki kwa nchi nyingi, mifano ya hivi karibuni ya kazi yake ikiwa ni pamoja na picha za Uwaziri Mkuu katika upande wa mbele wa noti mpya za dola 5 na dola 100 za Kanada.
hyp_text: Alipokuwa pia anafanya kazi ya kuandaa saini za benki kwa nchi nyingi, mfano wa kazi yake ya awali ni picha za waziri mkuu katika uso wa kipenzi cha kwanza cha Canada cha dola 5 na cha dola 100.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: Tabia yazo ya kijoto si thabiti kama mapango makubwa katika Dunia ambayo mara nyingi hudumisha halijoto sawa kwa kadiri fulani, lakini inapatana nazo kuwa mashimo marefu ardhini," alisema Glen Cushing wa Timu ya Falakiolojia ya Utafiti wa Jiolojia wa Marekani (USGS) na wa Chuo Kikuu cha Arizona Kaskazini kilichoko Flagstaff, Arizona.
hyp_text: Wao wao thermal yao si kama ya klabu kubwa za Ardhi ambazo mara nyingi huendelea kuwa na muda wa kujikwaa wa kawaida, lakini ni sawa na hivyo kuwa ni klabu za kina cha ardhi, alisema Glen Cushing wa Timu ya Astrogeology ya Shirika la Utafiti wa Ardhi wa Marekani (USGS) na Chuo Kikuu cha Arizona Kaskazini katika mji wa Flagstaff, Arizona.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Falme Tatu ilikuwa enzi yenye umwagaji damu zaidi katika historia ya China ya Kale, maelfu ya watu walikufa wakipigania kuketi kwenye kiti cha juu zaidi katika ikulu ya Xi'an.

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
ref_text: Mojawapo ya mbinu maarufu zinatozumiwa kuonyesha umuhimu wa kushirikiana ni kutumia mifano michache sikitishi ya watoto ambao, kupitia mapuuza, mikosi, kunyanyaswa kimakusudi, hawakushirikishwa na watu wazima walipokuwa wanapokua.
hyp_text: Moja ya mbinu zinazoonekana sana za kuonyesha umuhimu wa kushirikiwa ni kufikiri kwenye kazi chache za watoto wanaofanya kazi kwa sababu ya kutolipwa, kwa sababu ya mafanikio, au kwa sababu ya matumizi ya kibinafsi, ambao hawakushirikiwa na wazazi wao wakati walipokuwa wakijitendea.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.

hyp_text: Moja wa matendo ya kwanza ya kushinda katika karne ya pili ya Vita vya Pili vya Ulaya ilikuwa kampani ya Atlantiki ya Kaskazini. Waamerika walikuwa wakipendekeza kuhamisha watu na mali kwa ukanda wa Atlantiki kwa lengo la kuwasaidia Uingereza.

src_text: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ref_text: Wanyama nadra kama vile Dubu wa hudhurungi wa Ulaya, mbwa mwitu, tai, bundi, simba-mangu, paka mwitu na kware wa Ulaya wanaweza kupatikana huko, pamoja na spishi nyingine nyingi za kawaida.
